text:
While the previous sections discussed interactions between antipsychotics and

trazodone, antipsychotics and birth control, and trazodone and birth control,

this section will explore interactions between all three. The combination of

antipsychotic medications, trazodone, and birth control medications can

increase the risk of adverse effects such as changes in menstrual cycle, mood

changes, increased risk of blood clots, and orthostatic hypotension. (7)
